name: Digital Biomarker Capture Platform
purpose: Enable at-home collection of continuous mobility and sleep data for neurology studies.

risks.description: Wearable battery life below 7 days affects adherence.
risks.mitigation: Pilot alternate sensors; add wired charging kit.

risks.description: Data privacy concerns around continuous geolocation tracking.
risks.mitigation: Implement on-device aggregation; anonymize location traces.

risks.description: Delayed procurement of CE-marked hardware for EU sites.

achievements.summary: Completed first 50-patient usability test; 92% device uptime.
Secured ethics approval for continuous sleep monitoring arm.
Mobile app achieved 4.6â˜… rating in internal beta with 120 participants.
Firmware v2.0 beta released with 30% improved battery life.
Completed data privacy impact assessment with legal approval.

deliverables.description: Data-ingestion pipeline validated in GxP cloud

notes: Hardware procurement costs increasing due to supply chain issues.
